ALFA Coin Catcher – Privacy Policy

Effective date: 2025-09-04

ALFA Coin Catcher is an offline, hyper‑casual game. We do not collect, use, store, or share personal data.

Data Collection

  • No analytics or advertising SDKs are included.
  • No account, sign‑in, or cloud services are used.
  • No personal or device data is transmitted off the device.

Permissions

The app does not request sensitive permissions.

Contact

For questions, contact the developer listed on the Google Play store listing.
